home.welcome_text:
We are so happy you are here!
Our wedding day is fast approaching, and we are excited to share all the details with you.
Take a look around to find all the details about our celebration,
from the venue to the schedule and more.
home.tips_subtitle: Click below to check detailed recommendations by the bride and groom!

travel_tips.tips_intro: The wedding will take place in the city of Gramado, in the state of Rio Grande do Sul - the southernmost state in Brazil, and where the bride and groom were born. It’s a part of the “Serra Gaúcha”, a mountainous area whose architecture, gastronomy and culture is heavily influenced by its German and Italian roots. The city is a widely known tourist destination in Brazil, with multiple options for fun activities, sightseeing, restaurants and hospitality.
travel_tips.hotels_caption: We suggest hotels in Downtown Gramado so you can enjoy the city. They'll be about 20min from the location - there's Uber service in the city and we'll arrange transportation for the way back.

dress_code.title: Dress Code
dress_code.intro_text: We kindly ask our guests to dress in *formal attire*. The ceremony will take place outdoors, followed by an indoor reception.
dress_code.women_text: Long or midi dresses. Elegant embellishments are welcome. Stiletto heels are not recommended due to the outdoor setting. As temperatures may drop in the evening, we suggest bringing a warm wrap.
dress_code.men_text: Full suit with shirt and tie.
